--- title: Data oil keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This project is about doing some rersearch and analysis on oil (crude mainly but also derived product)" description: "This project is about doing some rersearch and analysis on oil (crude mainly but also derived product)" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install dataoil

How to use

Youd need to xreate a file called credentials.json with the following content

{
"api_key":"YOUR API KEY"
}

{% raw %} 
from dataoil.api import Api
api = Api()
wti = api.fetch_spot('WTI')
print(wti.head())

        date  price
0 2020-06-23  40.40
1 2020-06-22  40.60
2 2020-06-19  39.72
3 2020-06-18  38.79
4 2020-06-17  37.91
{% endraw %}
